Panda-F.Loong


Enhanced Network Connectivity


Optimized Intermediate Coordination Number

Panda-F.Loong


 Panda-F.Loong is a new generation of high-performance lithium aluminosilicate screen touch protection glass. This glass significantly improves drop resistance and strength performance, effectively meeting consumers' higher demands for product durability.


Glass Specification Dimensions

● Producible Thickness: 0.40-0.70mm


● Standard Size: 1300mm × 1100mm


● Standard Stock Thickness: 0.40mm/0.50mm/0.55mm/0.60mm/0.65mm/0.70mm

Note: Delivery size can be adjusted according to customer requirements


Glass Performance Data

◆ Thermal and Mechanical Properties

Densityg/cm³2.45
Thermal Expansion Coefficient×10⁻⁷/℃82
Softening Point℃772
Annealing Point℃548
Strain Point℃508
Young's ModulusGPa84
Shear ModulusGPa34
Poisson's Ratio-0.22
Vickers Hardness (before strengthening)kgf/mm²650
Vickers Hardness (after strengthening)kgf/mm²720
Pencil Hardness->8H


◆ Optical Properties

Photoelastic Coefficient
(nm/cm/MPa)

30.528.92827.627.2
Transmittance (%)>91.5

◆ Recommended 3D Hot Bending Process

ItemTemperature (℃)Pressure (MPa)Description
Preheating480~680/According to the number of preheating stations in the hot bending machine, try to maintain temperature uniformity
Forming660~6800.05~0.40Adjust pressure range according to product single-side or multi-side curvature and bending angle
Cooling680~300≤0.25To ensure contour rebound, it is recommended to adjust the pressure of the first two cooling stations to 0.1～0.2MPa
Note: The temperature difference fluctuation between different brands of hot bending machines and between different machines of the same brand is kept within ±20℃.


◆ Strengthening Example


    Sample Specifications: 2.5D 155×73×0.60mm


    Strengthening Performance:


 · Four-point bending >600MPa


 · Center ball drop performance ≥ 0.30J


 · Warpage <0.25mm 


 · Sandpaper drop ≥ 150cm 


Sichuan Hongke Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. is mainly engaged in the research, development, manufacturing and sales of protective glass for smart terminal displays, special glass for aerospace and new optical materials. It is the first high-tech enterprise in China to simultaneously realize the industrialization of high-alumina cover glass and lithium aluminum silicon cover glass.
